title: Worlds Emote 2016
body:
Hello there, 
a day or two ago, i could press ctrl 6 to show off my worlds ROX tigers emote, and have a recal symbol as well, (i have tier 3 icon), 
it is not working at all now,  what do i do?  is there a way to fix this? 

i want those emotes and recalls back tho.

replies.body:
Really guys? We paid RP to you(Riot) and spend more RP to get those jewels from chests just for a short period of time? Oh God... 
It's probably pointless to ask you bring it back, but i will still try. Please, bring them back. It doesn't brake game as rengar's rework. Why would you turn emotes off?{{item:3070}} {{item:2050}}

As *Therical* mentioned, these recall and emote animations expired shortly after World's 2016 ended. This was announced in our [World's 2016 Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-). You still get to keep the icons you crafted, but all emotes and recall animations are not coming back.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Those extra flashy things are gone because Worlds is gone.
